participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

apqc_smri_topo_ndefect.Description: Number of topology defects for left and right hemispheres before topology correction

apqc_dmri_fov_cutoff_dorsal.Description: Maximum dorsal cutoff score in dMRI FM images

apqc_dmri_fov_cutoff_ventral.Description: Maximum ventral cutoff score in dMRI FM images

apqc_dmri_bounwarp_flag.Description: Scans available for dMRI B0 unwarp | 0 = missing scans required for B0 unwarp; 1 = scans available for B0 unwarp

Levels.0: missing scans required for B0 unwarp

apqc_dmri_pepolar_diff.Description: Phase-encode polarity difference score for dMRI fieldmap | Negative score indicates fieldmaps with reversed phase-encode polarity; Near-zero scores indicate fieldmaps with same phase-encode polarity

apqc_dmri_b0dx_rms.Description: Root mean square of estimated B0 displacements in phase-encode direction for dMRI fieldmap

apqc_fmri_fov_cutoff_dorsal.Description: Maximum dorsal cutoff score in fMRI FM images

apqc_fmri_fov_cutoff_ventral.Description: Maximum ventral cutoff score in fMRI FM images

apqc_fmri_bounwarp_flag.Description: Scans available for fMRI B0 unwarp | 0 = missing scans required for B0 unwarp; 1 = scans available for B0 unwarp

Levels.0: missing scans required for B0 unwarp

apqc_fmri_pepolar_diff.Description: Phase-encode polarity difference score for fMRI fieldmap | Negative score indicates fieldmaps with reversed phase-encode polarity; Near-zero scores indicate fieldmaps with same phase-encode polarity

apqc_fmri_b0dx_rms.Description: Root mean square of estimated B0 displacements in phase-encode direction for fMRI fieldmap

apqc_fmri_intra_tsnr.Description: Intrascan temporal signal to noise ratio averaged across runs and averaged within brain mask

apqc_fmri_inter_tsnr.Description: Interrscan temporal signal to noise ratio averaged within brain mask

apqc_smri_t2w_regt1_rigid.Description: Normalized score indicating displacement and rotation of T2w volume relative to T1w volume

apqc_smri_t2w_regt1_warp.Description: Normalized score indicating stretching of T2w volume relative to T1w volume

apqc_dmri_regt1_rigid.Description: Normalized score indicating displacement and rotation of dMRI fieldmap relative to T1w volume

apqc_dmri_regt1_warp.Description: Normalized score indicating stretching of dMRI fieldmap relative to T1w volume

apqc_fmri_regt1_rigid.Description: Normalized score indicating displacement and rotation of fMRI fieldmap relative to T1w volume

apqc_fmri_regt1_warp.Description: Normalized score indicating stretching of fMRI fieldmap relative to T1w volume
